content: AI — wtf are we to do? We now have a divided and very angered nation, we have a president who shoots from the hip and is hell bent on making an international statement by dropping bombs left and right. Ugh, we can’t even get things straight here at home! It’s only been 3 months? It feels a lot longer than that. HT has once called you the Grasshopper, we need your wise counsel GH, even if it comes out of a fortune cookie. Maybe that’s how DJT gets his inspiration.
